ActorTalk: Manager Ross finally messaged me! It looks like Kuroro Coffee can keep running smoothly despite the pressure, which has really taken a load off his mind, bear!
He said he got anonymous threats earlier. Super suspicious! We've found our breakthrough!
I saved the text of the threat. Want to take a look?
No, we need the original! That's where the real clues are, bear!
Ross insisted on "out of sight, out of mind" and threw it out. Nobody could stop him.
Hmm... don't worry. Haley said this batch of trash is due for recycling, so it should still be in the cafe.
